title: What will Amazon look like in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Amazon is one of the companies I covered in my article, Top 20 Cloud Stocks for 2020 | Sramana Mitra, on our blog: While Amazon is not a pure play cloud company, we like it for the way it executes both its e-commerce business and the cloud business. It leads the way in AI and has the added advantage of enormous data to execute on.
Same as every other year, make sure you’re choosing the correct business model, learn that business model, and take action. Online retail/wholesale is the best for long term
